ComicInfo.Summary:
The lovely ladies of Street Fighter are back for more fun summer pinups, and they've brought along their fighting game friends from Darkstalkers, Rival Schools, and Final Fight! Chun-li, Cammy, and Laura are joined by Morrigan, Tiffany, Poison and many more!
